title: Brand new houses for sale in Piliyandala town
details:
Excellent investment opportunity from one of the fastest developing cities in Colombo district.

Located in-between Devananda road and Church road, Piliyandala. Walking distance to Swarapola and Piliyandala Town.

House details :

- Gated community
- 4 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms
- Balcony
- Maids washroom
- 2 car parking space
- 2200 sqft ( approx )
- 9 to 6 perch houses available

Price : Starting from 18.5 million

Contact for appointments : 0772 525457
